name: Silva (Katelyst)
description:
-- Silva --

Hi and thanks for downloading Silva!

Silva is a short horror game created for the Ludum Dare 46 GameJam of April 2020.

This game was created within 3 days by 4 people total.

CONTROLS:
W / Arrow up: Walk up
A / Arrow left: Walk left
S / Arrow down: Walk down
D / Arrow right: Walk right

Spacebar: Pick up wood / Drop wood in fire

1: Select choice 1
2: Select choice 2
3: Select choice 3

----------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

This project was built by MennoDekker.media and Katelyst
Special thanks to Gijs 'Atgeirr'
Find out more about the project at katelyst.com

RECOMMENDATION:

Up your brightness and play in the dark. The game is set in a dark forest, and might be hard to see in a bright environment.
